support.title: Experiencing any issues?
support.text: Feel free to contact us directly

locationPermissionModal.title: Enable Location
locationPermissionModal.text: We need access to your location so we can locate vehicles around you.

davBalancePopup.title: Your DAV coin balance is
davBalancePopup.text: DAV coins can be used for free rides

slide1.title: Welcome to DAV
slide1.subtitle: The best way to experience your city!

slide2.title: Find Your Vehicle
slide2.subtitle: You'll see us on the street and inside the app

slide3.title: Scan & Unlock
slide3.subtitle: Tap Unlock and scan the vehicle's QR code to start the ride

slide4.title: Ride it Like You Own It
slide4.subtitle: Put on your helmet and ride safely

slide5.title: End Ride
slide5.subtitle: Park according to local rules and tap End Ride to lock the vehicle

phone.title: Ride it like you own it.
phone.description: Add your mobile phone number to get started

code.title: Validate phone
code.text: An SMS with the code has been sent to

t&c.text: By using this app, you agree to the DAV

texts.wowzaText: You can pay for this ride with the DAV coins you earned!

deletePaymentModal.title: Remove payment method
deletePaymentModal.text: Are you sure you want to remove this credit card from your account?

paymentErrorModal.title: Uh oh!
paymentErrorModal.text: Something went wrong, please try again later

input.title: Enter the code
input.text: The code is located on the handlebars

cameraPermissionModal.title: Enable Camera
cameraPermissionModal.text: Enable camera in settings. Camera is used to scan QR codes.

Please try again, or scan a different QR code.
